channel.title: Me and The Bean
channel.itunes:author: Me and The Bean
channel.description: Me and The Bean is a girl/boy podcast featuring me and my wife. We discuss a plethora of topics ranging from our life, Mayberry loonies and whatever comes to mind.
channel.itunes:summary: Me and The Bean is a girl/boy podcast featuring me and my wife. We discuss a plethora of topics ranging from our life, Mayberry loonies and whatever comes to mind.

item.title: matb065. Where Can You Hit Someone With a Baseball Bat and Cause the Least Pain? The Ass of Course!
item.itunes:author: Me and The Bean
item.description: This week, we talk about Halloween, child abduction, weird military wannabes in creek beds, hitting your friends with a bat, shooting at your friends with a gun and cookie monsters.
item.author: meandthebean@podcastrant.com
item.itunes:summary: This week, we talk about Halloween, child abduction, weird military wannabes in creek beds, hitting your friends with a bat, shooting at your friends with a gun and cookie monsters.
item.itunes:keywords: comedy, family, kids, children, relationships, sex, politics, funny, humor, discussion, amanda, bean, chad, me

item.title: matb064. When Someone Says That They Have the Answer, RUN AWAY!!!
item.itunes:author: Me and The Bean
item.description: This week we talk about love of exercise, running into people that you have talked about on the show, even teachers have problems with grammar, vegan vs. cajun and Evan gets an imperial introduction.

item.title: matb35.5 Easter Greetings From Evan
